blank.name: blank
blank.description: Rune with the shape of a blank square

circle.name: circle
circle.description: Rune with the shape of a circle

corner.name: corner
corner.description: Rune with black triangle, filling upper right corner

heart.name: heart
heart.description: Rune with the shape of a heart

nova.name: nova
nova.description: Rune with the shape of two overlapping triangles, residing in the upper half of the shape

pentagram.name: pentagram
pentagram.description: Rune with the shape of a pentagram

rcross.name: rcross
rcross.description: Rune with the shape of a small square inside a large square, each diagonally split into a black and white half

ribbon.name: ribbon
ribbon.description: Rune with the shape of a ribbon winding outwards in an anticlockwise spiral

sail.name: sail
sail.description: Rune with the shape of a sail

square.name: square
square.description: Rune with the shape of a full square

triangle.name: triangle
triangle.description: Rune with the shape of a triangle

anaglyph.name: anaglyph
anaglyph.description: Renders the specified Rune in a tab as an anaglyph. Use 3D glasses to view the anaglyph.

beside.name: beside
beside.description: Makes a new Rune from two given Runes by placing the first on the left of the second, both occupying equal portions of the width of the result

beside_frac.name: beside_frac
beside_frac.description: Makes a new Rune from two given Runes by placing the first on the left of the second such that the first one occupies frac portion of the width of the result and the second the rest

color.name: color
color.description: Adds color to rune by specifying the red, green, blue (RGB) value, ranging from 0.0 to 1.0. RGB is additive: if all values are 1, the color is white, and if all values are 0, the color is black.

flip_horiz.name: flip_horiz
flip_horiz.description: Makes a new Rune from a given Rune by flipping it around a vertical axis, creating a mirror image

flip_vert.name: flip_vert
flip_vert.description: Makes a new Rune from a given Rune by flipping it around a horizontal axis, turning it upside down

from_url.name: from_url
from_url.description: Create a rune using the image provided in the url

hollusion.name: hollusion
hollusion.description: Renders the specified Rune in a tab as a hollusion, with a default magnitude of 0.1.

hollusion_magnitude.name: hollusion_magnitude
hollusion_magnitude.description: Renders the specified Rune in a tab as a hollusion, using the specified magnitude.

make_cross.name: make_cross
make_cross.description: Makes a new Rune from a given Rune by arranging into a square for copies of the given Rune in different orientations

overlay.name: overlay
overlay.description: The depth range of the z-axis of a rune is [0,-1], this function maps the depth range of rune1 and rune2 to [0,-0.5] and [-0.5,-1] respectively.

overlay_frac.name: overlay_frac
overlay_frac.description: The depth range of the z-axis of a rune is [0,-1], this function gives a [0, -frac] of the depth range to rune1 and the rest to rune2.

quarter_turn_left.name: quarter_turn_left
quarter_turn_left.description: Makes a new Rune from a given Rune by turning it a quarter-turn in anti-clockwise direction.

quarter_turn_right.name: quarter_turn_right
quarter_turn_right.description: Makes a new Rune from a given Rune by turning it a quarter-turn around the centre in clockwise direction.

random_color.name: random_color
random_color.description: Gives random color to the given rune. The color is chosen randomly from the following nine colors: red, pink, purple, indigo, blue, green, yellow, orange, brown

repeat_pattern.name: repeat_pattern
repeat_pattern.description: Applies a given function n times to an initial value

rotate.name: rotate
rotate.description: Rotates a given Rune by a given angle, given in radians, in anti-clockwise direction. Note that parts of the Rune may be cropped as a result.

scale.name: scale
scale.description: Scales a given Rune by a given factor in both x and y direction

scale_independent.name: scale_independent
scale_independent.description: Scales a given Rune by separate factors in x and y direction

show.name: show
show.description: Renders the specified Rune in a tab as a basic drawing.

stack.name: stack
stack.description: Makes a new Rune from two given Runes by placing the first on top of the second, each occupying equal parts of the height of the result

stack_frac.name: stack_frac
stack_frac.description: Makes a new Rune from two given Runes by placing the first on top of the second such that the first one occupies frac portion of the height of the result and the second the rest

stackn.name: stackn
stackn.description: Makes a new Rune from a given Rune by vertically stacking n copies of it

translate.name: translate
translate.description: Translates a given Rune by given values in x and y direction

turn_upside_down.name: turn_upside_down
turn_upside_down.description: Makes a new Rune from a given Rune by turning it upside-down
